title: syscall: add bind/mount operations to SysProcAttr on Linux
body: It would be nice to be able to pass a list of bind mounts to ForkAndExec via SysProcAttr, that Go bind mounts after forking (and execing): https://golang.org/pkg/syscall/#SysProcAttr. Alternatively, it would be nice to have the ability to pass a lambda to it that would call some syscalls (or raw syscalls) before it execs.
